description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Join Nene and his friends the week before his birthday. Each day you will have to face new challenges and activities. Unlock all the minigames, play against your friends and show them you are the best.
